    This package contains interfaces for controllers in package es.uvigo.esei.amchartsJava.core.controllers.trendLines
    es.uvigo.esei.amchartsJava.core.controllers
    This package contains controllers to components used by charts, graphs or trendLines.
    es.uvigo.esei.amchartsJava.core.controllers.axis
    This package contains controllers to categoryAxis,ValueAxis of amcharts and their base class AxisBase.
    es.uvigo.esei.amchartsJava.core.controllers.charts
    This package contains controllers for charts of amcharts
    es.uvigo.esei.amchartsJava.core.controllers.guides
    This package contains controller for guides of amcharts
    es.uvigo.esei.amchartsJava.core.controllers.trendLines
    This package contains controller for trendLines of amcharts
    es.uvigo.esei.amchartsJava.core.validators
    This package contains validators to paths, idiom and values of properties
